duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform mammograms and other diagnostic imaging procedures using state-of-the-art technology.
Ensure accurate and high-quality imaging results for fast and precise diagnosis.
Maintain and calibrate imaging equipment to ensure optimal performance and safety standards.
Collaborate with healthcare teams to provide essential diagnostic information for patient care.

education_certification.credential: Current ARRT RT(R) credential and unencumbered Oregon license in Radiologic Technology.
Performance of a minimum of 200 documented mammograms in the last calendar year preferred.
Experience in a hospital setting preferred.
